mapper.select: SELECT `car_id` AS `carId`, `car_name` AS `carName`, `gold_price` AS `goldPrice`, `seq_no` AS `seqNo`, `car_status` AS `carStatus`, `pic_url` AS `picUrl`, `has_gif_pic` AS `hasGifPic`, `gif_url` AS `gifUrl`, `has_vgg_pic` AS `hasVggPic`, `vgg_url` AS `vggUrl`, `is_time_limit` AS `isTimeLimit`, `effective_time` AS `effectiveTime`, `create_time` AS `createTime`, `allow_purse` AS `allowpurse`, `left_level` AS `leftlevel`, `mark_pic` AS `markPic` FROM `gift_car` WHERE `car_id` = #{carId}
